headlines.description: Napoli failed to gain ground on Serie A pacesetters Juventus and Inter Milan as they were held to a 1-1 draw at struggling SPAL on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Napoli held by SPAL, miss title race opportunity

headlines.description: AS Roma moved into fifth place in Serie A with a 2-1 win over AC Milan at the Stadio Olimpico on Sunday to continue the visitors' crisis.
headlines.shortLinkText: Roma deepen AC Milan crisis with crucial victory
